INTA.F.summary: Intracom Holdings S.A. operates as an IT solutions and services company. The company offers consulting, implementing, outsourcing, communication, and integration services to public, banking, telecommunication, transportation, and healthcare industries, as well as EU institutions. It also engages in the civil engineering, infrastructure, telecom network, renewable energy, and environmental construction, as well as real estate development activities. In addition, the company offers defense and security communication products comprising wideband radios, intercommunication systems, and satellite communication products; data link, telemetry devices, and cryptographic equipment, and as well as terminal and radio accessories; hybrid power stations, generator fuel saving systems, and energy storage systems; and turn-key homeland security solutions. Further, it operates a 21MW wind farm. Intracom Holdings S.A. was founded in 1977 and is based in Paiania, Greece.
